name: Commute (thisisstar)
description:
Dedicated to the San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency. Use the right arrow key to advance (or swipe right on mobile).

Made for the Public transit bitsy jam.

Made with Bitsy. I also used Bitsy Room Converter, Borksy, Custom Bitsy Fonts, and numerous Bitsy hacks!

Thanks to everyone who made those tools. Special thanks to Sean for adding a feature to the transparent sprites hack for me! 

Words, Art, and Music - Star St.Germain

Audio Mixing/Engineering/Production - Tim Riot
